description.text: Penetrates the enemy with dark energy, making the enemy unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of enemy's lost Health.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1*0.95*1.871
                                        
                                                                                    0.2% increased damage per 1% target missing Health
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、回復不可を1ターンの間付与する。対象の現在生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。

description.text: When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after attacking with Dark Shadow, activates Encroach. Encroach can only be activated once per turn the caster. Encroach (Acquire 1 Soul): Releases dark power to attack all enemies, with a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn.
description.text_ja: 【漆黒】で攻撃した時、対象の生命力が50%未満の場合、【蚕食】を発動する。【蚕食】は自身のターンに1回まで発生する。蚕食

description.text: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health. If the enemy dies, inflicts additional damage to all enemies proportional to the caster's Attack.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.8*0.95*1.871 (3.2 soul burn)
                                        
                                                                                    0.3% (0.7% soulburn) increased damage per 1% target missing Health, explosion on kill does 150% of self Attack
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、対象の現在生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、対象以外の敵全体に自身の攻撃力に応じて追加ダメージを与える。
description.burn_ja: ダメージがUPする。(魂力20消費)
